REPORT OF NEW EQUIPMENT SHOW AT 19S5 NARTB EQUIPMENT EXHIBIT
In order that NAEB members may foe kept Informed oi new developments in
the field of radio and television equipment, the NAEB Engineering Committee submits
the following report. No attempt is made to describe equipment which has been
on the market for s ome time and with which most are familiar. Much of such
equipment was covered in the Committee's report of 1953, Neither is any attempt
made to describe equipment which obviously would not interest members of the
organization. The following description covers new equipment briefly but if
more information is desired, it may be obtained by directing your request to NAEB
Headquarters or by writing direct to the manufacturer„
